FUNNYGAL Melissa McCarthy’s eye is filled with blood — and now a medical expert fears the shocking issue is a sign she’s going blind from a secret illness.

Recent photos show the five foot-two Mike & Molly sensation smiling despite the ugly red stain in her eye caused by an exploding blood vessel.

Dr. Charles Seltzer warns, “Broken blood vessels can be an indicator of something else that’s more serious, like diabetes, which could lead to loss of sight.

“She needs to see an eye doctor.”

Her life could also be in danger from a series of health issues, says the diet and weightloss specialist who has not treated Melissa.

“Diabetes, high blood pressure, a blood-clotting disorder, heart attack, stroke — if you have any one of those and you’re not doing something about it, they can kill,” Seltzer says.

Before her eye problem, friends feared the 47-year-old Ghostbusters star was digging her own grave with a knife and fork. But when she hit a scale-crushing 255 pounds, Melissa started an exercise program and low-carb, high-protein diet. She shed 75 pounds.

But the weight crept back on.

Now Seltzer says she will be fighting another “uphill battle to keep her sight and avoid ailments that lead to certain death!”
